author: sky.cactus
content: Clicked link, browser page opened, it told me to download, I clicked download and then immediately cancelled, then clicked join via browser.

author: sky.cactus
content: Put in my name, joined.  Took a bit to actually join and get audio connected, but it eventually worked.

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!642887713246150666> Let me know if there is a better way for me to participate without voice than Zoom chat.  I usually don't have a mic at this hour because my household is asleep (sometimes I am as well).

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!543900561460822016> I *suspect* that the EIP is just political grandstanding and/or internet trolling given that the author hasn't returned to address your comments, despite being on Twitter talking about their contribution.

author: sky.cactus
content: If you wanted to press the issue, you could reply to https://twitter.com/JohnLilic/status/1298142560981065728 and tell them that it is unlikely anyone will take them seriously until they have a valid draft EIP.

content: Thank you <@!301186049323958275> and <@!543900561460822016> for actively joining the EIPIP meeting.
